metadata.title: CVE-2016-7407 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The dropbearconvert command in Dropbear SSH before 2016.74 allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted OpenSSH key file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-7407` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dropbear - 2016.74-1
dropbear-bin - 2016.74-1
dropbear-initramfs - 2016.74-1
dropbear-run - 2016.74-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dropbear package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2016.74-1').
